testCase.requirementText: All documentation pertaining to the transferred content is placed in one or more file group elements with mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute value “Documentation”.
testCase.description: This requirment mandates that there must be at least one mets/fileSec/fileGrp element with a USE attribute set to 'Documentation' but there can be more.

rule.description: The package METS document MUST contain at least one mets/fileSec/fileGrp element with a use attribute of "Documentation".

error.message: An information package METS document must contain a mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Documentation" element.

package.name: no_doc_file_grp
package.description: The package root METS document has no mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Documentation" element.

package.name: single_doc_file_grp
package.description: The package root METS document has a single mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Documentation" element.

package.name: multi_doc_file_grp
package.description: The package root METS document has multiple mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Documentation" elements.
